title: 9 Great Reads From CNET This Week: Tech in Ukraine, Airline Design, '9 to 5' and More - CNET
content: 9 Great Reads From CNET This Week: Tech in Ukraine, Airline Design, '9 to 5' and More  CNET
description: How Ukrainians are making use of phones, social media and cryptocurrency, plus giving an identity to a new airline, looking back at the Dolly Parton movie over four decades, and then some.
